column1:
Odeinoichus,"2017-09-15T19:31:15.82Z","Fun Little Polybag with Unique Character.","

Set #30400 Gymnastics Bar: This is a bit of a surprise, this Polybag for LEGO Friends includes a mini-doll that isn’t part of the main group typically included in these sets. Let’s go over the pros and cons real quick and then give some final thoughts on this charmingly fun Polybag.
Pros:

column2: Naomi Mini-Doll has been included in an Advent Calendar and Heartlake Cupcake Café before this, this is the first time she’s been offered in such a cheap package.
Includes two fun little models, a brick-built stereo and a small gymnastics bar for gymnastics practice. Very cute and fun models.
Mini-Doll includes water bottle accessory using cylinder and Dalek eyestalk for construction.

column1: Cons:

column2: Gymnastics bar model is relatively low to the ground.
Limited number of parts for the asking price.

column1: Overall opinion

I adore this Polybag, it may have little to offer, but the overall package is just a great little set with a very unique Mini-Doll character. Someone new and rare to find at such a great price, it would have been nice though if they’d used a different lower leg piece, perhaps something new to give her a proper gymnasts outfit. Still I’d strongly recommend picking this one up if you can.

,TRUE,4,3,3,4,4 loykiley","2018-01-24T21:43:35.71Z","Good for price","

I bought this polybag at Walmart for only $1.50. It is not many pieces but comes with one minifig, a water bottle accessory, and the balance beam build. With just the set alone, there is not much to do or display, but you get what you pay for. It is a good thing to add to your other Friends sets, and for the price, you can’t beat it. I am very happy with my purchase.
